LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashBag.label: trash bag
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashBag.description: Packed trash. Its not dirty, but it looks so awful.
LanguageData.RimTrash_UnknownFilth.label: unknown filth
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashMeal.label: trash mixed meal
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashMeal.description: A trash mixed meal, smelly, if you eat this, most likely you has stomach ache.
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashIED.label: IED trash trap
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashIED.description: A pair of firefoam shells connected to a trigger which detonates on touch or bullet impact. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashLauncher.label: Trash launcher
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashLauncher.description: A wide-barreled trash shell launcher. The shells scatter filths on impact, offending to targets.
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashLauncher.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashLauncher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashLauncherBullet.label: Trash launcher shell
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashShell.label: trash shell
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashShell.description: A shell filled with filth and a small explosive charge. Starts fires when detonated and scatter filths. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RimTrash_TrashShellBullet.label: trash shell
